newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Oct 21.

text.p: * International Business Machines Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings per share of $2.43, compared to $2.30 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 129-3/8 on Friday.
* Eastman Chemical Co is expected to report third quarter earnings of $1.27 a share, compared to $1.81 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 54-5/8.
* Ashland Inc is expected to report fourth quarter earnings of $0.66 a share, compared to $0.70 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 42-7/8.
* Microsoft Corp is expected to report fiscal first quarter earnings of $0.90 a share, compared to $0.78 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 134-3/4.
* Ekco Group Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings of $0.10 a share, compared to $0.23 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 3-3/4.
* Alexander & Alexander Services Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings of $0.24 a share, compared to $0.25 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 15-1/4.
* Herbalife International Inc is expected to report third quarter earnings of $0.27 a share, compared to $0.01 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 16-7/8.
* Chevron Corp is expected to report third quarter earnings of $0.95 a share, compared to $0.81 a year ago, according to First Call. The stock closed at 67-1/2.
